title: Xioami redmi note 11
desc: Xiaomi Redmi Note 11 phone has a quad-camera setup on the back. This formation consists of a 50MP wide, 8MP ultrawide, 2MP macro, 2MP depth camera. It has a 13MP selfie camera inside the punch hole of the display. The video recording capability is 4K@30fps, 1080p@30/60fps. Its RAM and ROM have two (64/128GB/4/6GB) variants. On the other hand, it can not support microSDXC on using a shared SIM slot. Certainly, Redmi Note 11 has a 5000mAh battery with 33W fast charging. It has a dual nano-SIM card slot. That is to say, Redmi Note 11 is 2G/3G/4G/5G supportable.

title: One Plus Nord CE 2 5g
desc: The OnePlus Nord CE2 5G is now available in two variants (128GB/6/8GB RAM). Now, the OnePlus Nord CE2 5G’s Price is 35990 Taka in Bangladesh. Nord CE2 5G has a 4500 mAh battery with 65W fast charging. This device is running with Android 11 and powered by the MediaTek MT6877 Dimensity 900 5G (6 nm) chipset.

title: Xioami 12s
desc: The Xiaomi 12S is now available in two variants (128/256GB/8/12GB RAM). Now, Xiaomi 12S’s Price is coming to Taka in Bangladesh. 12S has a 4500mAh battery with 67W fast charging. This device is running with Android 12 and powered by the Qualcomm SM8450 Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 (4 nm) chipset.
